resource.chars:
MS/547/7/19
5 Lyttelton Special 
volcanic rocks. Lava flows were found in the frequently recurring 
plutonic rock which forms the basement of the mountains. 
Before the arrival of the "Morning" the "Discovery" had 
experienced some privation owing to part of the supplies having 
gone bad. This accounted for the death of all the dogs. She has 
however, revictualled from the "Morning" and the explorers are 
now in a position to spend a comfortable winter. 
Reuter's Special Service
[signed]
Mar 25 03
